turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. How are you doing? Can you get a pizza order going from Bella Luna for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm doing great. i sure can, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to get three small thick-crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and for the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one I want buffalo chicken and then the second one, can I get shrimp? And then on the third one I just want Italian sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, bella luna does not carry buffalo chicken or shrimp.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they do What kind of What kind of meat options do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want some other options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have pepperoni, prosciutto, sausage, italian sausage, chicken, and ham.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get passito, then. That sounds pretty good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, what do I have so far? I have Italian sausage and one and then one shrimp pizza? So, I need a third one, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: shrimp isn't available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted Poshudo, instead of shrimp.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and then what did you want instead of buffalo chicken?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just make that one Canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so you want 3 small thick crust pizzas, 1 with prosciotto, 1 italian sausage, and 1 with canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $30.19 is the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and put that in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that was all I wanted.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. enjoy the pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.
